channel.title: SAA 2018 Government Digital Data - Leigh Anne Ellison

item.title: Sharing Curation Expertise and Space for Digital Archaeological and Cultural Heritage Data
item.description:
Leigh Anne Ellison Francis Pierce-McManamon

Abstract

Archaeologists are busy all the time. Often stretching to meet a variety of professional obligations. CRM and government agency archaeologists are among the most stretched given the different directions that pull upon their professional lives. Scholarly pursuits; administrative, bureaucratic, regulatory, and public outreach responsibilities â€¦
item.dc:creator: Leigh Anne Ellison
